title.value: Context used for withdrawing the CAT 3 Documents where planned_withdraw_date is before or equals today.

dql_where.value: category = 3 and a_status = 'Effective' and domain='GMP' and planned_withdraw_date <= DATE(NOW) and planned_withdraw_date is not nulldate
